issue.title: [Rust] Remove libc from dependencies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8396](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8396). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Code has been removed that use libc calls but dependency sits in there. We can remove it before the next release.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8396?focusedCommentId=17080922) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
